meaning: purport, gist, elegance, interest, proceed to, tend, become

onyomiExamples.meaning: meaning, point (e.g. of a statement), gist, effect, goal, intent, object, aim, point
grudge, malice, spite, intention, disposition, obstinacy, reason, revenge

kunyomiExamples.meaning: meaning, tenor, gist, effect, influence, appearance, aspect, grace, charm, refinement, taste, elegance

to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to, to become, to face (facts, circumstances, etc.), to abide by, to agree to, to consent to, to obey
